mapper.insert: insert into quotation (qhodate_no,company_code,employee_code,ware_code ,valid_date, progress) values (#{qhodate_no}, #{company_code}, #{employee_code},#{ware_code},#{valid_date,jdbcType=DATE},#{progress, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM quotation WHERE TO_DATE(SUBSTR(qhodate_no, 1, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_DATE(#{qhodate_no}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
